Description.Text:
Position The Hotel Touring is located in a quiet position in the Citt√† Giardino, a district not far from the picturesque old town of Grado.
Restaurant The restaurant offers a rich breakfast buffet, from 07.30 to 09.30 a.m. The restaurant offers also an Italian and international cuisine with choice of menu, children dishes and salad buffet for lunch and dinner.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations OTHER SERVICES: Entire property is air conditioned Lift/elevator Pets accepted Front desk - 24 hour Front desk - fax service Front desk - safety deposit box Golf course TV Room Bar Restaurant
Guests of the Hotel Touring can use the swimming pool of the Hotel Villa d'Este 30 metres away.
Check-in: from 01.00 p.m. Beach service included for reservation HB/FB
